Message:
“Messenger of Flames.
Lend me your power once more!”

That’s what Yildiz
told me after we escaped,
her eyes focused on the smoke
rising from the settlement.

Back in the temple,
all three of us were shielded
from those flames...

Even though my pathetic power
should have only worked on me...

But making a miracle
like that happen twice...?

...No, there’s no time for doubt...!
I can’t guarantee anything,
but I still have to try...!

We hurried towards
the settlement,
only to find everything
bathed in a vortex of fire.

Torches in hand,
the city soldiers looked on
at their handiwork and laughed.

I can hear cries for help
coming from the flames...!
There are people
trapped inside...!

Forcing my buckling legs
to move, I jumped into the fire.

Before me was a lone girl,
trembling in fear.
I wrapped her in my arms,
protecting her from
the surrounding flames.

I just need to remember
the feeling from earlier...!

It’s impossible after all...!
My power...is useless...!
